author: sofi.heessen
title: Open Source Development Ecosystem
description: How can we ensure that the Cardano ecosystem is built on a framework which is owned by the community and equally accessible to all?
importance: We need to grow an entire ecosystem of experts to build and maintain the foundations of Cardano/Catalyst together with the current IOG teams
success: A growing number of experts join forces to build collaboratively on community owned infrastructure, tooling, standards, libraries and docs
